name: Color³
description:
Welcome in Color³

 In a world where painting is your only weapon. You play as a cubic alien and you have been captured so that intelligence tests can be performed on you. Do you want it to stop? 

But you're stuck in a cube-shaped lab. Your goal is to get out of this lab.  

Use the environment of the lab!  

Use your abilities! 

And eliminate all the enemies to get out of this hell.

-------------------------------------------------------

How to play ?

The goal is simple, the player controls a cube which will kill colored enemies by rolling his cube in paint the same color as the enemy and then crushing it.

But to get there, he will have to use different blocks which have their own specialty in order to successfully reach the enemies.

-------------------------------------------------------

Features Camera

You must manage your camera in order to have control over your gaming experience.

8 Special blocks

Learn to use different blocks, each more different from the other, which will allow you to kill the enemies you meet.

3 Different types of enemies

More you will progress in the game, more you will confront several enemies with differents caracteristics.
